languages.text: По приказу Лорд-капитана блюстители искоренили культ смерти, и сотни незримых служителей его утеряли свой путь в темных глубинах нижних и средних палуб. Лишенные суровой опеки, многие из них предались воровству и вредительству.

The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.
languages.original_text: По приказу Лорд-капитана блюстители искоренили культ смерти, и сотни незримых служителей его утеряли свой путь в темных глубинах нижних и средних палуб. Лишенные суровой опеки, многие из них предались воровству и вредительству.

traits.locale_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.
Upon the Lord Captain's orders, the enforcers eradicated the death cult, and hundreds of its unseen members lost their paths in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks.

Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

languages.text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, les prévôts ont éradiqué le culte de la mort. Ceux qui s'en remettaient autrefois à ses préceptes déambulent désormais sans but dans les profondeurs des ponts inférieurs et intermédiaires. Libérés de la stricte tutelle des tisseurs, bon nombre d'entre eux n'éprouvent plus aucun scrupule à voler ou à négliger leur devoir.
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

traits.locale_text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, les prévôts ont éradiqué le culte de la mort. Ceux qui s'en remettaient autrefois à ses préceptes déambulent désormais sans but dans les profondeurs des ponts inférieurs et intermédiaires. Libérés de la stricte tutelle des tisseurs, bon nombre d'entre eux n'éprouvent plus aucun scrupule à voler ou à négliger leur devoir.

languages.text: El personal de seguridad ha erradicado el Culto de la Muerte bajo órdenes de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Los que antes buscaban la guía del culto ahora deambulan perdidos en las negras profundidades de las cubiertas medias e inferiores. Sin la estricta tutela de los tejedores, muchos de ellos no demuestran el menor escrúpulo en lo concerniente al latrocinio y el abandono del deber.
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

traits.locale_text: El personal de seguridad ha erradicado el Culto de la Muerte bajo órdenes de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Los que antes buscaban la guía del culto ahora deambulan perdidos en las negras profundidades de las cubiertas medias e inferiores. Sin la estricta tutela de los tejedores, muchos de ellos no demuestran el menor escrúpulo en lo concerniente al latrocinio y el abandono del deber.

languages.text: 在行商浪人的命令之下，执法者铲除了船上的死亡教派。那些曾经向拜死教寻求指引的人，如今迷失在了底层甲板的黑暗之中。失去了织网者严厉的看管后，许多人不再有任何顾虑，肆无忌惮地盗窃财物、玩忽职守。
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人的命令之下，执法者铲除了船上的死亡教派。那些曾经向拜死教寻求指引的人，如今迷失在了底层甲板的黑暗之中。失去了织网者严厉的看管后，许多人不再有任何顾虑，肆无忌惮地盗窃财物、玩忽职守。

languages.text: エンフォーサーはロード・キャプテンの命令を受け、死のカルトを根絶させた。かつて教団に導きを求めた者たちは今、下層デッキや中層デッキの暗い闇に迷い込んでいる。織り手の厳しい監視がなければ、彼らの多くはもはや盗みや職務怠慢を働くことに何のためらいも持つことはない。
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

traits.locale_text: エンフォーサーはロード・キャプテンの命令を受け、死のカルトを根絶させた。かつて教団に導きを求めた者たちは今、下層デッキや中層デッキの暗い闇に迷い込んでいる。織り手の厳しい監視がなければ、彼らの多くはもはや盗みや職務怠慢を働くことに何のためらいも持つことはない。

languages.text: Die Enforcer haben den Todeskult auf Befehl des Lord Captains ausgelöscht. Wer einst Halt in dem Kult fand, irrt nun durch die dunklen Tiefen der unteren und mittleren Decks. Ohne die gestrenge Führung der Spinner haben viele von ihnen keine Skrupel mehr, was Diebstahl und Pflichtverletzung angeht.
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcer haben den Todeskult auf Befehl des Lord Captains ausgelöscht. Wer einst Halt in dem Kult fand, irrt nun durch die dunklen Tiefen der unteren und mittleren Decks. Ohne die gestrenge Führung der Spinner haben viele von ihnen keine Skrupel mehr, was Diebstahl und Pflichtverletzung angeht.

languages.text: İnfazcılar, Lord Kaptan'ın emri üzerine ölüm tarikatının kökünü kazıdı. Bir vakitler kılavuzluk arayışıyla tarikata sığınanlar, şimdilerde alt ve orta güvertelerin karanlık derinliklerinde amaçsızca dolanıp duruyor. Dokurların katı muhafızlıklarından yoksun kalmalarıyla aralarından pek çoğu, artık hırsızlık ya da vazifeye itaatsizlik hususunda hiçbir rahatsızlık hissetmiyor.
languages.original_text: The enforcers eradicated the death cult on the Lord Captain's orders. Those who once looked to the cult for guidance now wander lost in the dark depths of the lower and middle decks. Without the spinners' harsh guardianship, many of them no longer have any qualms about thievery or disregard of duty.
